messages.message:
These are the commands I had to use to deconflict:
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C01N7DV1137/p1680549940630279?thread_ts=1680549389.990289&cid=C01N7DV1137
Yes, these are some of the artifacts of metrics-server but not all. We might have to delete all the artifacts that were installed during metrics-server installation.
I am currently trying to test if adding `--force` in the helm upgrade command could overwrite any existing resources for metrics-server in the cluster.
